verses.roman:
haridāsa ṭhākurera haila parama ānanda
vāsudeva datta, gupta murāri, sena śivānanda

synonyms: haridāsa ṭhākurera—of Haridāsa Ṭhākura; haila—was; parama—topmost; ānanda—ecstasy; vāsudeva datta—Vāsudeva Datta; gupta murāri—Murāri Gupta; sena śivānanda—Śivānanda Sena.
translation: Also hearing this auspicious news, Haridāsa Ṭhākura became very much pleased. So also did Vāsudeva Datta, Murāri Gupta and Śivānanda Sena.
